pages.text: $(thing)Pricklers$() can be found in the $(thing)Snowy Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(). These normally passive creatures don't appreciate being attacked, and will retaliate, aided by their prickly spines.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Prickler$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using $(item)Lilac Mushrooms$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 2$().
